content.rendered:
Gunjal Delight Rice is the affordable range of everyday rice to make each meal memorable. It is the perfect choice for people who like to include rice in their daily meals. True to the quality of the best basmati rice, the pearly white, slender grains impart a lovely, delicate scent to any meal they are in.
Enriched with nutritional value, it is defined by its aromatic, flavorful & long grains. Whether you are having Khichdi or Fried Rice, Gunjal Delight will turn every meal into comfort food.
Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • XL size grain
  • Great choice for everyday cooking
  • Suitable for dishes such as Khichdi & Fried Rice
  • Long white grains that do not stick to each other on being cooked
